explanation: [0-0] In front of a white wall, Mario and Luigi stand behind a white table. The table is covered with six strips of black tape, and on it are a bottle of blue liquid and a stack of banknotes placed in one of the sections between the tapes. Mario is wearing a red T-shirt and blue overalls, while Luigi is wearing a green T-shirt and blue overalls, both wearing white gloves. Behind them, the wall is decorated with colorful lights.
